content: formerly amigurumi fat baby **this pattern has not been tested ** **pattern featured on bbcamerica com 1 ** **photo tutorial now available for the fingers and toes** 2 **i have updated this pattern rewritten round 9 of the arm/hand and hopefully corrected the stitch count/math problems from my previous original version it s only taken me 6 years to finally do it i will be keeping the faq & errata page open for all downloads before september 12 2014 ** **rating ** * intermediate for increases and decreases/early advanced for finger and toe shaping **materials ** * worsted weight yarn i used red heart supersaver in white or any flesh tone would work * 4 00mm hook * stitch marker * 2 9mm black safety eyes * small amount of black floss and needle to embroider the mouth * tapestry needle * fiber fill ____________________________ **for previous version downloaded before september 12 2014 ** round 9 of hand is now rewritten and can be found in the faq & errata page please notify me if it still doesn t make sense now with photos please refer to my faq & errata page in the link below for any questions about my pattern you may have if your question is not answered there or if you are still unclear with my explanations please email me at midknighstarr@gmail com ** faq & errata post at my wordpress 3 ** 1 http //www bbcamerica com/anglophenia/2012/11/welcome-to-the-doctor-who-knitting-circle/ 2 http //midknightstarr wordpress com/tutorials/adipose-fingers-and-toes/ 3 http //midknightstarr wordpress com/2013/10/19/amigurumi-fat-baby-faq-and-errata/
